name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discussions on HN, Reddit and Lobsters

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See if the current page has been discussed on Hacker News, Lobsters and Reddit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find discussions on Hacker News, Reddit, Lobsters and others.

Once installed a badge is shown with the number of discussions and comments for the pages you visit. Click the badge to see the list of all the discussions.
